tasks.title: Create project structure per implementation plan
tasks.description: Create the complete project structure as defined in the implementation plan, including all necessary directories and initial files
acceptanceCriteria: All required directories are created according to the plan
Initial configuration files are in place
Structure matches the implementation plan specification

tasks.title: Initialize Docusaurus project with custom theme
tasks.description: Set up the Docusaurus project with a custom theme suitable for educational content
acceptanceCriteria: Custom theme is applied and functional
Basic styling matches educational content requirements
Configuration files are properly set up

tasks.title: Create docs/modules/ directory structure for all 12 modules
tasks.description: Create the directory structure for all 12 book modules with proper naming conventions
acceptanceCriteria: Directory naming follows the specified convention
Each module directory has a diagrams subdirectory
Structure is consistent across all modules
Directory structure matches the implementation plan

tasks.title: Create static assets directories (diagrams, images, videos)
tasks.description: Create the static assets directories for storing visual content

tasks.title: Create code-examples/ directory structure for all modules
tasks.description: Create the directory structure for code examples organized by module
acceptanceCriteria: All 12 module subdirectories are created under code-examples/
Directory naming follows the specified convention
Structure is consistent across all modules
Each directory is ready for code example files
Directory structure matches the implementation plan

tasks.title: Create hardware/ directory with subdirectories
tasks.description: Create the hardware directory structure for BOMs, diagrams, and assembly guides

tasks.title: Create manifest/ directory with modules.json template
tasks.description: Create the manifest directory and initialize the modules.json template
acceptanceCriteria: modules.json template is created with proper structure
Template includes all required fields for module metadata

tasks.title: Set up package.json with Docusaurus dependencies
tasks.description: Configure package.json with all necessary Docusaurus and related dependencies
acceptanceCriteria: package.json includes all required Docusaurus dependencies
Scripts for development and build are configured

tasks.title: Configure docusaurus.config.js with basic settings
tasks.description: Set up the main Docusaurus configuration file with basic settings
acceptanceCriteria: Site builds successfully with the configuration

tasks.title: Create initial sidebars.js with placeholder structure
tasks.description: Create the sidebars configuration file with placeholder structure for modules
acceptanceCriteria: Placeholder structure for all 12 modules is defined

tasks.title: Set up GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment
acceptanceCriteria: GitHub Actions workflow files are created

tasks.title: Implement basic linting configuration
tasks.description: Set up linting configuration for Markdown, JavaScript, and other files

tasks.title: Create module template with proper frontmatter
tasks.description: Create a reusable template for book modules with proper frontmatter
acceptanceCriteria: Template includes all required frontmatter fields

tasks.title: Create src/ directory with components, pages, and css subdirectories
tasks.description: Create the source directory structure for custom Docusaurus components

tasks.title: Set up babel.config.js for custom components
tasks.description: Configure Babel for custom Docusaurus components
acceptanceCriteria: Build process works with Babel configuration

tasks.title: Create _category_.json template for module directories
tasks.description: Create a category template for module directories to define navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Template includes proper label and position fields
Template can be reused across modules

tasks.title: Create custom Docusaurus components for educational content
tasks.description: Develop custom components for learning objectives, prerequisites, and other educational elements

tasks.title: Implement sidebar auto-generation from JSON manifests
tasks.description: Create functionality to automatically generate sidebars from JSON manifest files
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar reflects module structure from JSON
Sidebar updates when JSON manifests change

tasks.title: Set up content pipeline from Claude → Speckit → Docusaurus
tasks.description: Configure the automated content generation pipeline
acceptanceCriteria: Speckit Plus workflow is set up
Content flows from generation to Docusaurus

tasks.title: Create JSON manifest structure for modules
tasks.description: Define and implement the JSON manifest structure for module metadata

tasks.title: Implement frontmatter rules for learning objectives, prerequisites, difficulty levels
tasks.description: Set up proper frontmatter configuration for educational content elements
acceptanceCriteria: Fields are properly processed by Docusaurus

tasks.title: Create accessibility components for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
tasks.description: Develop components that ensure accessibility compliance

tasks.title: Set up search functionality with full-text search capabilities
tasks.description: Configure search functionality for the Docusaurus site
acceptanceCriteria: Full-text search works across all content

tasks.title: Implement navigation structure for linear and modular learning paths
tasks.description: Create navigation that supports both sequential and modular learning

tasks.title: Add i18n support for multi-language content
tasks.description: Implement internationalization support for multiple languages

tasks.title: Create link checking script for validation
tasks.description: Develop a script to check for broken links across the site

tasks.title: Set up build validation workflow
tasks.description: Create a validation process that runs during the build

tasks.title: Create PDF generation configuration with Puppeteer
tasks.description: Set up PDF generation workflow using Puppeteer
acceptanceCriteria: PDF generation workflow is set up
